statements: DELETE FROM models WHERE model_id = 10 AND model_name = 'Example Model';
DELETE FROM designers WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM models WHERE model_age < 25 AND model_gender = 'Female';
DELETE FROM designers WHERE designer_specialty = 'Fashion' OR designer_specialty ='Interior Design';
DELETE FROM fashion_shows WHERE show_name = 'Paris Fashion Week';
DELETE FROM collections WHERE collection_name = 'Summer Collection';
DELETE FROM models WHERE model_id = 100 AND age > 25;
DELETE FROM collections WHERE year < 2010 AND designer_id = 3;
